name: Mika's Directional
tagline: adds a customizable action bar that displays coordinates and facing direction
alt: X, Y, and Z coordinates and facing direction appear above the Minecraft hotbar
desc: Adds a customizable action bar that includes your coordinates and facing direction!
overview:
Never get lost again!

Mika's Directional is a Minecraft 1.18 plugin that adds a customizable action bar that includes your coordinates and facing direction! The action bar appears upon movement and fades away after a few seconds of no movement.
features:
• Enabling or disabling the coordinates and/or facing direction
  • Changing the color of the labels and values
  • Changing server-wide defaults for the above
  • In-game commands have tab prediction
  • Optional permissions to restrict usage of in-game commands

howToUse.title: commands
howToUse.body:
To view the commands available to you, use:
/md

To enable or disable a feature, use:
/md toggle [coords/direction/both]

To change the color of the labels or the values, use:
/md setColor [labels/values] [named color/hex code]

To reload the config*, use:
/md reload
*Only opped players may use by default.

howToUse.title: config
howToUse.body: Defaults for your players can be set using the config file.

toggleAccordion.title: Looking for the default generated config file?
toggleAccordion.body: To view the generated config file, you can go see it on the GitHub here.

howToUse.title: permissions
howToUse.body:
By default, all players may customize the appearance of their action bar through /md toggle and /md setColor.
However, this can be changed by altering the config:
NeedUserPerms: false true
Then, players will need the MikaDirectional.User permission to use /md, /md toggle, and /md setColor.
A good resource for setting permissions is LuckPerms.

By default, only opped playeres may reload the config through /md reload.
However, this can be changed by altering the config:
NeedReloadPerms: true false
Then, players will no longer need to be opped or have the MikaDirectional.Reload permission to use /md reload.
